channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8075] B2B registration in germany not possible
item.description:
2015-10-22 21:10:20,848 ERROR [hybrisHTTP2] - [10.191.16.11] - - - [SapCustomerService] WebServiceException while calling method 'if08CreateCustomer' on SAP PI interface: message = 'Could not send Message.', cause = 'SocketTimeoutException invoking http://pipdisap.dat.datwyler.biz:52000/XISOAPAdapter/MessageServlet?senderParty=&senderService=WSP&receiverParty=&receiverService=&interface=SI_Hybris_v1_out&interfaceNamespace=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.distrelec.com%2Fhybris: Read timed out'.
2015-10-22 21:10:20,862 WARN  [hybrisHTTP2] - [10.191.16.11] - - - [AbstractRegisterPageController] Registration failed because of an ERP communication error!
com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.exception.ErpCommunicationException: Error during SAP method: if08CreateCustomer

item.summary: B2B registration in germany not possible

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Can you please send me the request? Do you still have problem here?
no body is complaining. i will close the ticket.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7914] export products with webuse attribute containing ≤ OR ≥
item.description: and reset the german localized pim xml hash for those products
item.summary: export products with webuse attribute containing ≤ OR ≥

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
example:

UPDATE Product;pimId[unique=true];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=de];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=cs];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=da];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=en];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=et];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=fi];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=fr];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=hu];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=it];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=lt];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=lv];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=nl];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=no];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=pl];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=ro];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=ru];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=sk];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=sl];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=sv];pimXmlHashLocalized[lang=uk]
;X0003800;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
attached impex file
removed localized hash value for the according products on P.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8003] 500-Unknown Error after clicking in some categories
item.description:
After clicking in some level 4 categories, I land in a 500 Unknown error page:

Check the following links:

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/automation/industrial-communication/interface-converters/serial-interface-converter-repeater/c/cat-DC-57837?q=*&filter_Category3=Interface+Converters&filter_Category4=Serial+interface+converter+%26+repeater

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/computing-hobby/computing-pc-components/notebooks-tablets-ereader/laptops-netbooks/c/cat-33738?q=*&filter_Category3=Notebooks+%2F+Tablets+%2F+eReader&filter_Category4=Laptops%2FNetbooks

http://www.distrelec.ch/en/computing-hobby/computing-pc-components/notebooks-tablets-ereader/tablets/c/cat-376314?q=*&filter_Category3=Notebooks+%2F+Tablets+%2F+eReader&filter_Category4=Tablets
item.summary: 500-Unknown Error after clicking in some categories

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Will, any ideas why this is happening? Please have a look, thanks!
Not yet, its not reproducable on Q: http://test.distrelec.ch/en/computing-hobby/computing-pc-components/notebooks-tablets-ereader/c/cat-L3D_542666

in the log i can only see:

2015-10-22 10:39:30,454 ERROR [hybrisHTTP601] - [10.191.16.11] - - - [error_page_log] a technical error occured [uuid: 57bd0e3e-0bab-4a53-ba43-13c142116c45 ]
java.lang.NullPointerException
  • no issues in CH DE http://www.distrelec.ch/de/computer-hobby/computer-und-pc-komponenten/notebooks-tablets-ereader/c/cat-L3D_542666
  • its working for other channels, I think its a data issue only. will start CH EN FF export
try to reproduce issue on Q, with importing data from P
can not be reproduced on Q

from DISTRELEC-8011 try to access the category https://www.distrelec.ch/en/computing-hobby/storage-peripherals/monitors-mice-keyboards/monitors/samsung-business-monitors/c/cat-319276
and got 500 Error.

finally I found the problem! Missing category name & missing category name seo causes this issue.

This category is working as expected on P now: https://www.distrelec.ch/en/computing-hobby/storage-peripherals/monitors-mice-keyboards/monitors/samsung-business-monitors/c/cat-319276

This is a PIM data issue

Hi

We have issues in the shop because of missing category names in PIM. Here a list of categories which have no names in english: http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20865/Categories_NO-Name-EN.csv

For example in SK we have about 3000 categories with no name.

Please check the category names for each language in PIM and add a name if missing.

Thx
Will
reproducable locally: http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20867/screenshot-2.png
committed to v4.1.7. fixed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7987] Millimeter converted to inches in filter
item.description: Some lengths are displayed in inches instead of mm, see screenshot.
item.summary: Millimeter converted to inches in filter

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Hi Will, can you have a look at that?

Hi Erik

Please provide me the search term and the website.

Thx
Will

https://test.distrelec.biz/en/tools-measurement/laboratory-connectors-accessories-for-measurement/laboratory-connectors/c/cat-L3D_525581

Seems to only be on the test site.

This works in the CH EN channel: http://test.distrelec.ch/en/tools-measurement/laboratory-connectors-accessories-for-measurement/laboratory-connectors/c/cat-L3D_525581

-> I think with executing the FF export for the export shop, this issue should be solved.
Its fine on P: http://www.distrelec.biz/en/tools-measurement/laboratory-connectors-accessories-for-measurement/laboratory-connectors/c/cat-L3D_525581

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7922] Wrong display of filters
item.description:
• the Price filter title looks broken, The Filter name comes from Fact Finder, where we have the correct name "Price" in each language.
  • The filter "Length" does not correspond to the filter on the product, check screenshot 1 (http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/thumbnail/20726/_thumb_20726.png) In Fact Finder we are getting the data in mm, and a conversion is taking place. It is the same issue in all shops (Not sure if related to the migration)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: had a call with Mr Türk and sent a mail with the screenshots to him. He will check it now
price filter issue solved on P

Hallo Herr Spalinger,
die Umsetzung hat glücklicherweise vorzeitig erfolgen können.
Die Legacy-Lösung steht unter https://share.omikron.net/index.php/s/d8bc0b831efb8c73f38a49ae6ba34598 (Passwort: ffdistrelec) in Form einer neuen JAR-Datei zum Abruf bereit. Es braucht lediglich der Master-Server, der die Importe ausführt, neugestartet werden.
Bitte platzieren Sie in der Konfiguration fff.properties anstelle von
fff-customClasses-distrelec-current.jar!/extendedUnifyAttributeUnitsImportHandler
die folgende Zeile
fff-customClasses-distrelec-current.jar!/legacyUnifyAttributeUnitsImportHandler
Nach dem Datenimport und dem Neuladen der Konfigurationen (http://10.191.20.145:8080/FACT-Finder/Configurator.ff?do=flushConfiguration) wird die gewohnte Darstellungsweise wiederhergestellt sein.

Beste Grüße
Gebriyel Türk
FACT-Finder Project Development

Deployed new jar to Q. Display is now as excepted to be: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410 but filter "Länge" is not working anymore. need to check why

we have an issue, if you open (the url call from ajax) http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410?q=*&useTechnicalView=true&pageSize=10&requestType=ajax&filter_Category3=Handwerkzeuge&filter_L%E4nge~~mm=30&filter_Category4=Bits you get:

The requested URL was rejected. Please consult with your administrator.

Your support ID is: 10533611291503284692

Hi Marek

I have an issue with an url called by ajax in a facet: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410?q=*&useTechnicalView=true&pageSize=10&requestType=ajax&filter_Category3=Handwerkzeuge&filter_L%E4nge~~mm=30&filter_Category4=Bits

Opening this url results in:

The requested URL was rejected. Please consult with your administrator.

Your support ID is: 10533611291504588865

Could you please tell me what the issue is here?

Thank you very much.

BR
Will

Hello Wilhelm.
There is problem with conversion of some characters:
Failed to convert character violation details
Context Parameter (detected in Query String)
Parameter Name filter_L�nge~~mm
Buffer filter_L�nge~~mm

Best Regards,

-------------------------------------------
Marek Hrasko

Open filter link in a new tab is working as expected, the url is not rejected: http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410?q=*&filter_Category4=Bits&filter_Category3=Handwerkzeuge&filter_L%C3%A4nge~~mm=30

Only the ajax call is not working, because it changes the spelling of the filter parameter to &filter_L%E4nge~mm=30 which is not working but this parameter is working &filter_L%C3%A4nge~mm=30

After deployment of this fix, we need to change the customClasses.jar to:

lrwxrwxrwx 1 hybris hybris   45 Oct 16 14:22 fff-customClasses-distrelec-current.jar -> versioned/fff-customClasses-distrelec-1.2.jar
Please test after the next deployment

Not sure if directly related with the previous problem, but now the filters in the screenshot (http://jira.distrelec.com/secure/attachment/20868/2015-10-22%2016_10_33-Buy%20Bits%20_%20Distrelec%20Switzerland.png) can't be selected.
Problem exists only in Q CH EN channel right?

check http://test.distrelec.ch/de/werkzeuge-messtechnik/werkzeuge/handwerkzeuge/bits/c/cat-L3D_525410 filter length / Länge. if you open it in a new tab, its working as expected but its not working if you just select it.
Looks fine on Q
